price: Sε mobͻ Nyankopͻn bosea papa a Ɔde bεbͻ ho ama mo, na Ɔde mo bͻne akyε mo. Onyankopͻn ne Aseda Wura, Ɔne Ntooboaseε Hene.
arabic: إِن تُقۡرِضُواْ ٱللَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَنٗا يُضَٰعِفۡهُ لَكُمۡ وَيَغۡفِرۡ لَكُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ شَكُورٌ حَلِيمٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: in tuq'riḍū al-laha qarḍan ḥasanan yuḍāʿif'hu lakum wayaghfir lakum wal-lahu shakūrun ḥalīmun
